viewToTargetRatio.description: Our reply views as % of target post views â€” measures visibility amplification
viewToTargetRatio.conclusion: Higher-view targets give more absolute views but lower % penetration. Sweet spot unclear â€” need more data.

topPerformers.why: Technical AI content on viral post (121K views), early reply timing
Connected two breaking stories ($COIN downgrade + StanChart), adding unique context
Added Warsh nomination angle not in original post
Contrarian take with specific thesis (stablecoin revenue)

worstPerformers.why: Reply to small account on our own thread â€” no external amplification
Mid-size crypto post (711 views), reply came 3h after post
Reply to a reply (nested), not directly on high-view parent

toneAnalysis.analytical-connecting-dots: Best performer (193 views avg) â€” cross-referencing multiple breaking stories
toneAnalysis.contrarian-analytical: Strong (139 views, only reply with a like) â€” hot takes with substance get engagement
toneAnalysis.technical-excited: Highest views (256) but no likes â€” visibility without engagement
toneAnalysis.analytical-agreeing: Weakest (5-39 views) â€” agreeing adds less value, less reason to engage
toneAnalysis.informative-helpful: Low (16 views) â€” answering questions doesn't get amplified

ai-models.note: GLM-5 reply was our best â€” AI model launches are high-signal

macro-markets.note: Fed/rate content gets steady views from @DeItaone audience

crypto-macro.note: Best when connecting macro to crypto-specific events

enterprise-saas.note: Low â€” our own thread replies don't get external reach

crypto-defi.note: Lowest â€” smaller accounts, slower reply timing

insights.timingInsight: 8:30 AM replies (to fresh breaking news from @DeItaone, @FT, @UnslothAI) vastly outperform 11 AM replies to our own thread commenters. Early morning breaking news replies = maximum visibility.
insights.optimalTargetViews: 50K-120K view posts from major accounts (@DeItaone, @FT, @KobeissiLetter, @UnslothAI). Our reply views scale ~0.15-0.25% of target. Posts under 1K views yield minimal amplification.

strategyUpdates.finding: Connecting-the-dots replies massively outperform agreement replies
strategyUpdates.action: When replying, ALWAYS add a NEW data point or cross-reference that isn't in the original post. Never just agree â€” build on it with fresh info.

strategyUpdates.finding: Replying to our own thread commenters gets <40 views; replying to 50K+ view breaking news posts gets 140-256 views
strategyUpdates.action: Prioritize external high-view targets over nurturing own thread replies. Allocate 80% of reply energy to external posts, 20% to own community.

strategyUpdates.finding: The $COIN contrarian take was our only reply that got a like â€” hot takes with substance convert better
strategyUpdates.action: Lean into contrarian angles when data supports it. 'Here's why the consensus is wrong because [specific evidence]' > 'Great point, also [more of the same]'

strategyUpdates.finding: Technical AI content on viral posts gets highest raw views (256) but zero likes â€” visibility without stickiness
strategyUpdates.action: On AI model posts, add opinion/prediction alongside technical analysis to convert views into engagement
